treatment-md.title: Calosoma (Calosoma) scabrosum subsp. scabrosum Chaudoir 1869
treatment-md.article-title: Calosomaaethiops (Jeannel, 1940) as a new synonym of Calosomaimbricatumhottentotum Chaudoir, 1852, a new status of Calosomaroeschkei Breuning, 1927, and a revision of the Calosomasenegalense group sensu Haeckel, 2012 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Carabini)
